F L I C K T I O N A R Y - Modular Vanilla JS Pokédex

F L I C K T I O N A R Y 2025

Flicktionary is a responsive, client-side web app built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, styled with Bootstrap. It fetches data from the PokéAPI in batches to support infinite scrolling, dynamically renders each Pokémon as an interactive entry, and uses modals for detailed views. The project is modular, performance-optimized, and includes polyfills for broader browser compatibility.

Read more

PokémonĀkaibu - Modular Vanilla JS Pokédex

PokémonĀkaibu 2025

PokémonĀkaibu is a responsive, client-side web app built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, styled with Bootstrap. It fetches data from the PokéAPI in batches to support infinite scrolling, dynamically renders each Pokémon as an interactive entry, and uses modals for detailed views. The project is modular, performance-optimized, and includes polyfills for broader browser compatibility.
